trans-unit.source: The <see cref="N:System.Configuration.Install" /> namespace provides classes that allow you to write custom installers for your own components.
trans-unit.target: O namespace <see cref="N:System.Configuration.Install" /> fornece classes que permitem a você gravar instaladores personalizados para seus próprios componentes.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.Installer" /> class is the base class for all custom installers in the.NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: A classe <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.Installer" /> é a classe base para todos os instaladores personalizados no .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: Through the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A> property, an installer contains a collection of other installers as children.
trans-unit.target: Por meio de <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A> propriedade, um instalador contém uma coleção de outros instaladores como filhos.

trans-unit.source: As the installer is executed, it cycles through its children and calls <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>, or <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Como o instalador é executado, ele percorre seus filhos e chamadas <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>, ou <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A>.

trans-unit.source: For an example of an object in the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A> collection, see <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de um objeto de <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A> coleta, consulte <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Context%2A> property contains information about the installation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Context%2A> propriedade contém informações sobre a instalação.

trans-unit.source: For example, information about the location of the log file for the installation, the location of the file that saves information required by the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> method, and the command line that was entered when the installation executable was run.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, informações sobre o local do arquivo de log para a instalação, o local do arquivo que salva as informações necessárias para o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> método e a linha de comando que foi digitada quando o executável de instalação foi executado.

trans-unit.source: For an example of an installation executable, see [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de um executável de instalação, consulte [Installutil.exe (ferramenta de instalação)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>, and <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> methods are not always called on the same instance of <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>, e <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> métodos não forem chamados sempre na mesma instância de <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might use an <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> to install and commit an application, and then release the reference to that <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode usar um <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> para instalar e confirmar um aplicativo e, em seguida, liberar a referência ao <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>.

trans-unit.source: Later, uninstalling the application creates a new reference to an <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>, which means that the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> method is called on a different instance of <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>.
trans-unit.target: Posteriormente, a desinstalação do aplicativo cria uma nova referência para um <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>, o que significa que o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> método é chamado em uma instância diferente do <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>.

trans-unit.source: For this reason, do not save the state of a computer in an installer.
trans-unit.target: Por esse motivo, não salve o estado de um computador em um instalador.

trans-unit.source: Instead, use an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that is preserved across calls and passed into the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>, and <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, use um <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> que é preservado em chamadas e passado para o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>, e <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> métodos.
